text: 2011 NASCAR Stock V6 Series was the support series for the NASCAR Corona Series. This season was the first with the name Stock V6. The season was raced only in ovals. ==Resume== The season began in the Autódromo Potosino. Rubén García, Jr., son of the driver Rubén García Novoa, won the first event. In the second race, Raúl Galván Jr. take the victory. Meanwhile, Rubén García, Jr. won the championship. ==Drivers== {| class="wikitable" !Team!!Manufacturer!!No.!!Race Driver!!Rounds |- |ANVI Motorsport|| ||20||Edgar Mondragón||All |- |CEDVA Racing Team|| ||55||Jorge Contreras, Sr.||1–2 |- |rowspan=5|CMS Racing Products|| ||10||Jacobo Cosio||2 |- | ||11||Javier Fernández||1–2 |- | ||28||Felipe Rodríguez||1–2 |- |rowspan=2| ||72||Marco Castañeda||1 |- | || Enrique Contreras III||2 |- |Comsel|| ||17||Ricardo Cantú||1–2 |- |Curiel Racing||Mazda||06||Hugo Curiel||1–2 |- |rowspan=2|Dynamics Motorsport|| ||18||Oscar Torres, Jr.||1, 3–10 |- | || ||Héctor Aguirre||2 |- |HDI Seguros||Mazda ||4||Rubén García, Jr.||All |- |Rullops||Mazda||22||Raúl Galván, Jr.||All |- |UMAP Racing Team|| ||77||Abel Arroyo||1–2 |- | ||Nissan||27||Ricado Peralta||1 |} ==2011 calendar== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:85%;" |- !No. !Race Title !Track !Date !Time |- |1 |San Luis Potosí | Autódromo Potosino, Villa de Zaragoza |3 April |11:25 |- |2 |Aguascalientes | Autódromo Internacional de Aguascalientes, Aguascalientes |1 May |11:25 |- |3 |Querétaro | Autódromo Querétaro, Santiago de Querétaro |5 June |11:10 |- |4 |Puebla | Autódromo Miguel E.
